General.Name: Zhejiang Weiming Environment Protection Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Weiming Environment Protection Co., Ltd. provides solid waste disposal services in China. It focuses on solid waste-related technological development, project investment, project construction, and operational management services, as well as manufactures and sells waste incineration equipment. The company also invests in, constructs, and manages 41 waste incineration and power generation projects. In addition, it offers solid waste treatment, kitchen waste and sewage treatment, smart sanitation, and hazardous waste treatment services. Zhejiang Weiming Environment Protection Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.
